attachments.title: JFK Displays Actual Wait Times Using Sensors That Monitor Mobile Phones - Blip Systems
attachments.text: New York’s busiest—and one of the world’s largest—airports is now displaying real-time wait times for major queues. The wait times are powered by BlipTrack sensors from Denmark-based BLIP Systems and installed by Lockheed Martin. Passengers moving through JFK Airport’s Terminal 4 are now presented with estimated processing times on 13 new screens. The large and...
